title: 1995 Advantage Zero Emissions Industries FCV Vanguard Hydrogen Powered Speedboat with 2023 SBT Trailer
item_description:
Zero Emissions Industries FCV Vanguard Hydrogen Powered Speedboat with 2023 SBT Trailer

Boat Specifications and Features

  • Make: Advantage
  • Year: 1995
  • Hull NO: AVI27017C595
  • CF Number: 5060UY
    • Expiration Date: 12/31/2025
  • Type: Speedboat
  • Overall Length: 330” or 27.5'
  • 50+ mph top speed
  • Near-silent operation
  • Standard speedboat throttle and steering - drives and handles like an ordinary speedboat
  • Selectable auto-hybrid operation or battery-only mode
  • Fueled at retail hydrogen fueling stations or on location by using FTcase
  • Capacity for 4 passengers (2 seated, 2 standing)
  • Completely refurbished 1995 Advantage 27 hull (fiberglass)

Specifications and Equipment

  • Stern Drive: Mercury Bravo III with high efficiency contra-rotating propeller
  • Electric Motor: 250 kW Danfoss (+1 spare)
  • Fuel Cells: Twin 85 kW Hyundai “HTWO” modules in parallel (+2 spares)
  • Battery: 24 kWh Votari (+1 spare)
  • High Voltage Bus: 700 VDC, using Bel converter and inverter (+1 spare set)
  • Controls: Dana Novi ECU with Matlab/Simulink codebase (+1 spare)
  • Hydrogen Storage: Hexagon Type IV 700 bar, 9.8 kg (245 L water volume) (+3 spare)
  • Fueling: Standard 700 bar fueling receptacle, with J2799 comm fill protocols
  • Engine Type: Hybrid hydrogen fuel cell electric drive
  • Engine Make: ZEI
  • Engine Model: Z-Class
  • Engine Power: 335hp
  • Two Modes: Battery only and fuel cell hybrid
  • Fuel cells made by Hyundai
  • Battery made by Voltari
  • Fuel: Hydrogen stored in one 9.8kg hydrogen tank, 700 bar.

Trailer Details

  • Year: 2023
  • Make: Fabriqué Par Sport Boat Trailers
  • VIN: 4FBBC2721P1026081
  • License: 4VY6908
    • Expiration Date: 10/31/2028
  • Gross Vehicle Weight Rating (GVWR): 10,000 Lb
  • Trailer Type: Boat

Trailer Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 29’
  • Overall Width: 105”

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Leaf Spring
  • Number of Axles: 2
  • Brake Type: Electric
  • Number of Wheels: 4
  • Tire Size: ST225/75R15
  • Electric Plug Type: 7-Way Round
  • Hitch: 2 5/16" Ball

Spare parts for this lot can be found in lots:

  • 0006 - Spare motor
  • 0010 - Spare lithium ion battery
  • 0209 - Spare power converter

Note: (2) Certificate of Title and (2) Transfer Form will be mailed 1-2 weeks following the last day of removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the transfer of title, registration, sales tax, and fees due to DMV.
